title: Sound On: Trump Prods Biden on Crime, CHIPS Act Vote
itunes:title: Sound On: Trump Prods Biden on Crime, CHIPS Act Vote
description:
Joe was joined by Samara Klar, Associate Professor at the University of Arizona School of Government and Public Policy on Mike Pence and Donald Trump's speeches in Washington today, North Carolina Congresswoman Deborah Ross on when we can expect the CHIPS Act to pass in Congress and the status on funding for Covid-19. Plus, Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis on the divide in the Republican party and how the White House is handling updates on President Biden's health after contracting Covid-19. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
